At the St. Pete Pier Driven by the vibrant spirit of St. Petersburg, Teak Properties founder Chuck Prather was inspired to craft an unforgettable destination for both visitors and residents. Rooted in the heart of downtown, Prather sought to infuse a tranquil maritime ambiance into the cityâ€™s dynamic landscape. With a dedication to diversity, he curated three distinct concepts, ensuring a welcoming experience for all. His vision is for this establishment to serve as a central gathering place, fostering connections among friends, families, and colleagues, enriching the community fabric. Chuck Prather Owner & Founder Downtown Paradise Our Three Properties Create the Ultimate Pier Experience Family-Friendly The whole family is invited to sip, savor, and relax while soaking in the sun! Pier Teaki turns 21+ after sunset at 8pm. Amazing Views Enjoy the bay view and cityscape at either the grand lawn by Driftwood Cafe, floor-to-ceiling windows at Teak, or the rooftop bar at Pier Teaki! Exquisite Food Executive Chef Felicia Lacalle has crafted amazing cuisine from Cuban-inspired bar bites to excitingly flavorful entrÃ©es. Craft Drinks Relax with the specialty coffee and teas at Driftwood Cafe or indulge in tasty tropical cocktails or mocktails at Teak and Pier Teaki. About Us â€” Pier Solutions 0 Skip to Content Solutions All Solutions Design and Engineering Fabrication, Manufacturing and Assembly Site Services H2 Scan About QHSE News Join Our Team Contact Us Enquire Today Open Menu Close Menu Solutions All Solutions Design and Engineering Fabrication, Manufacturing and Assembly Site Services H2 Scan About QHSE News Join Our Team Contact Us Enquire Today Open Menu Close Menu Folder: Solutions Back All Solutions Design and Engineering Fabrication, Manufacturing and Assembly Site Services H2 Scan About QHSE News Join Our Team Contact Us Enquire Today About us A message from Jordan Ferguson, CEO of Pier Solutions. Our reputation for excellence is built on combining innovation with efficient project delivery. Our Vision A modern, sustainable and integrated energy infrastructure is a jigsaw of different solutions. We will develop an eco-system of global partnerships to help deliver that. Our Mission To accelerate the deployment of a modern, sustainable and integrated energy infrastructure, both on & off-grid, and which serves community, commercial and industrial needs. Our Values Best in class delivery, to the highest standards of safety, quality and collaboration, and in-line with our clients needs. At Pier Solutions, we are a bespoke manufacturer with in-house design and fabrication capabilities, delivering turnkey engineered solutions that seamlessly integrate multiple technologies. Our expertise uniquely positions us to support energy transition projects, including hydrogen, battery storage, renewables, and hybrid technology systems. We will guide you through every stage of the process to ensure your module meets your exact needs. Our unparalleled customer service guides you through every step of the process, from conceptualising a solution that meets your space needs to the intricate design and engineering phases. We ensure that each module is expertly fabricated and delivered, enhancing your workflow and maximising efficiency. Passionate about problem solving Headquartered in Kintore, Aberdeenshire, UK and active around the globe, our experienced team has a long track record of delivering innovative and engineered solutions. The pace and scale of the Energy Transition requires the mass rollout of innovative, modern and sustainable solutions. At Pier Solutions we are passionate about problem solving. Our solutions are custom-built by experts who have the experience to support all industries, whatever your requirements. By combining deep industry knowledge with multiple, integrated technologies and purpose-built solutions, and a long-standing track record of working in harsh conditions, we create sustainable and more efficient modular systems to support energy production, storage and distribution. Our team has supported clients across a wide range of industries including high profile media, entertainment, leisure, military, and energy transition projects. Our Approach 1. Providing conceptual and front end realisation for your project. Outlining the solutions, strategy, costs and schedule early in the project's development. 3. We believe no two projects are the same. Pier Solutions has a multi-discipline team that can deliver bespoke single unit or multi-phase modular projects. We thrive on innovation and collaboration and make every cubic metre count. 2. Project management is at the core of our offering. Pier Solutions will manage and support your project through all stages of the project lifecycle. Employing expedient delivery philosophies with a focus on Safety, Quality, Cost and Schedule. 4. We have developed a network of f abrication and design specialists within Scotland, England, Germany and China to allow us to strategically deliver our projects. 5. We deliver our projects safely , within budget, on time and to the highest quality , following globally recognised standards. Pier Teaki â€“ Teak St. Pete Skip to content Facebook Instagram Home Menu Parties & Events Hours Contact Visit Our Location Tropical Rooftop Bar Pier Teaki Sip on one of our handcrafted cocktails while taking in the panoramic views. Whether you're sharing a romantic evening or enjoying a night out with friends, our rooftop tiki bar guarantees unforgettable moments. Guests must be 21 or older after 8pm. Shop Gift Cards Take a glance at The Pier Teaki Menu Learn about our Service Charge Learn More Our aim is to professionalize one of the only industries in the world that has no guaranteed income for the service provider, (i.e., the hospitality industry). We have adopted a service model that utilizes a sales commission for every dollar sold for an employee, regardless of discount. This commission-based system has been in use for decades. We are proud to continue setting a high standard for employee compensation in the vibrant Florida restaurant industry. Our companyâ€™s legacy is built on the belief that legendary service is provided by a team â€“ not just one person. It is shown in every detail of the Teak LLC experience. Ever since opening in 2020, we have been committed to compensating all employees, both front and back of the house, as the professionals they are. This model ensures that our team will thrive, our guests will continue to receive an outstanding experience and our company is well-positioned for the future. What is a service charge? A 20% service charge is included on each check. Teak LLC retains 100% of the service charge. Does this mean that your servers will make less? No. This model was implemented in Seattle almost two years ago and in Dunedin a year and a half ago so we have extensive data which tells us that it is working well for staff, guests, and the companies. Our servers and bartenders are paid a commission and there is a revenue share model for the rest of the service team. The result is that the whole team benefits from delighting our guests from the moment they arrive until they leave us for the night. Our entire team will do as well or better with this model. Our professional service team receives industry-leading compensation including commissions on sales, health insurance, matched 401K, and extensive education and training for a successful career path. Are you also raising prices? No. In fact, we are developing ways to add even more value to our guests by not having to raise prices due to labor costs. What will you do if a guest is upset about their service? We know that excellent service is provided by a team â€“ not just one person. It is shown in every detail of the Teak LLC experience and all our people are dedicated to providing that. We stand behind what we do. If a guest is not delighted â€“ we will make it right. Thatâ€™s what we have always done. Will employees still be rewarded for a job well done? Our servers and bartenders are paid a commission and there is a revenue share model for the rest of the service team. The result is that the whole team benefits from delighting our guests from the moment they arrive until they leave us for the night. Our entire team will do as well or better with this model. In addition, we provide health insurance to our team and their families (at 25 hours a week.) We have a great 401K with matching program and a career path with extensive training opportunities. We really want people to build their careers with us. That is why we invest so much in training and development so that our team grows and thrives. What if there is a problem with my experience? If there is any aspect of your experience that does not exceed expectations, we will make it right. What if I still want to leave a tip? Additional gratuities are accepted but not expected. You guys are already so expensive, isnâ€™t this going to scare people off? This percentage is already in line with what most of our guests were leaving as a gratuity. Our guests come here because they know they are getting the very best service. Now it is just inclusive in the bill. They donâ€™t have to do the math. Itâ€™s just part of what we do. Is this going to help with the disparity between front of the house and kitchen compensation? Our company culture doesnâ€™t work that way. We have always paid well and provided great benefits to all of our employees. It is part of why people love working here. We respect our employees for the pros they are. We pay them well; we provide health insurance to our team and their families. We have a great 401K with matching program and a career path with extensive training opportunities. We really want people to build their careers with us. That is why we invest so much in training and development so that our team grows and thrives. What has the reaction been from employees? We have been talking to our team for a while now about this and have taken their input to heart and I believe they know that we are absolutely committed to making sure they do as well or better than they did before. Our team is made up of professionals who have made hospitality their career and they count on doing well here because they have families, they are homeowners, they are active members of their community. Teaki Huts & Large Events At Pier Teaki, there are a few options for hosting private events. Our Teaki Huts overlooking St. Peteâ€™s skyline and Tampa Bay. Each Teaki Hut provides seating for 6 guests, with standing space to accommodate 2 additional guests. Our Teaki Huts are perfect for special occasions like birthdays, bachelorette parties, and more! For larger groups, two partial buyout options are available for up to 75 guests. For more information on Teaki Hut & Large Event rentals, contact our event team at 727-513-8325. Shop Gift Cards Take a glance at The Pier Teaki Menu Learn about our Service Charge Learn More Our aim is to professionalize one of the only industries in the world that has no guaranteed income for the service provider, (i.e., the hospitality industry). We have adopted a service model that utilizes a sales commission for every dollar sold for an employee, regardless of discount. This commission-based system has been in use for decades. We are proud to continue setting a high standard for employee compensation in the vibrant Florida restaurant industry. Our companyâ€™s legacy is built on the belief that legendary service is provided by a team â€“ not just one person. It is shown in every detail of the Teak LLC experience. Ever since opening in 2020, we have been committed to compensating all employees, both front and back of the house, as the professionals they are. This model ensures that our team will thrive, our guests will continue to receive an outstanding experience and our company is well-positioned for the future. What is a service charge? A 20% service charge is included on each check. Teak LLC retains 100% of the service charge. Does this mean that your servers will make less? No. This model was implemented in Seattle almost two years ago and in Dunedin a year and a half ago so we have extensive data which tells us that it is working well for staff, guests, and the companies. Our servers and bartenders are paid a commission and there is a revenue share model for the rest of the service team. The result is that the whole team benefits from delighting our guests from the moment they arrive until they leave us for the night. Our entire team will do as well or better with this model. Our professional service team receives industry-leading compensation including commissions on sales, health insurance, matched 401K, and extensive education and training for a successful career path. Are you also raising prices? No. In fact, we are developing ways to add even more value to our guests by not having to raise prices due to labor costs. What will you do if a guest is upset about their service? We know that excellent service is provided by a team â€“ not just one person. It is shown in every detail of the Teak LLC experience and all our people are dedicated to providing that. We stand behind what we do. If a guest is not delighted â€“ we will make it right. Thatâ€™s what we have always done. Will employees still be rewarded for a job well done? Our servers and bartenders are paid a commission and there is a revenue share model for the rest of the service team. The result is that the whole team benefits from delighting our guests from the moment they arrive until they leave us for the night. Our entire team will do as well or better with this model. In addition, we provide health insurance to our team and their families (at 25 hours a week.) We have a great 401K with matching program and a career path with extensive training opportunities. We really want people to build their careers with us. That is why we invest so much in training and development so that our team grows and thrives. What if there is a problem with my experience? If there is any aspect of your experience that does not exceed expectations, we will make it right. What if I still want to leave a tip? Additional gratuities are accepted but not expected. You guys are already so expensive, isnâ€™t this going to scare people off? This percentage is already in line with what most of our guests were leaving as a gratuity. Our guests come here because they know they are getting the very best service. Now it is just inclusive in the bill. They donâ€™t have to do the math. Itâ€™s just part of what we do. Is this going to help with the disparity between front of the house and kitchen compensation? Our company culture doesnâ€™t work that way. We have always paid well and provided great benefits to all of our employees. It is part of why people love working here. We respect our employees for the pros they are. We pay them well; we provide health insurance to our team and their families. We have a great 401K with matching program and a career path with extensive training opportunities. We really want people to build their careers with us. That is why we invest so much in training and development so that our team grows and thrives. What has the reaction been from employees? We have been talking to our team for a while now about this and have taken their input to heart and I believe they know that we are absolutely committed to making sure they do as well or better than they did before. Our team is made up of professionals who have made hospitality their career and they count on doing well here because they have families, they are homeowners, they are active members of their community.
